description: The moms are testing the dads’ mettle in this fun take on an age-old debate! Who will end up victorious?  ♂️ ♀️We’ve all been there, whether as parents or kids – why aren’t chores split evenly in the family? Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (❗) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily’s newest story, Moms vs Dads!  ♂️ ♀️🏆 Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!🏆 Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levels🏆 Get to know the differences between the four couples! Who will you be rooting for?🏆 Take in six fun locations including favorites like Camp Talon and Emily’s house🏆 Earn diamonds and build your own kids’ paradise in Emily’s back yard🏆 Beat daily challenges to earn extra diamonds🏆 Collect all the postcards and send heartfelt greetings to all your loved ones🏆 Help Emily and Patrick discover what is truly important in lifeEmily is thrilled with her family, but now that she has three kids, it seems there’s 10 times the work! Balancing her work in the diner, her cooking vlog, her chores AND her family is getting harder and harder. When she notices Patrick acting like playing with the kids occasionally is him doing his fair share, she decides she’s had enough! 👶🏻 👶🏽Her girlfriends all have similar experiences - men who don’t help out in the house unless asked, men who only “babysit” their own kids…. and they’ve had enough! It’s time to ACT, and show them how much work it really is. Can the girls get their men dashing around the house, or will this end up being a recipe for disaster?
descriptionHTML:
The moms are testing the dads’ mettle in this fun take on an age-old debate! Who will end up victorious? ♂️ ♀️

We’ve all been there, whether as parents or kids – why aren’t chores split evenly in the family? Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (❗) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily’s newest story, Moms vs Dads! ♂️ ♀️

🏆 Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!
🏆 Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levels
🏆 Get to know the differences between the four couples! Who will you be rooting for?
🏆 Take in six fun locations including favorites like Camp Talon and Emily’s house
🏆 Earn diamonds and build your own kids’ paradise in Emily’s back yard
🏆 Beat daily challenges to earn extra diamonds
🏆 Collect all the postcards and send heartfelt greetings to all your loved ones
🏆 Help Emily and Patrick discover what is truly important in life

Emily is thrilled with her family, but now that she has three kids, it seems there’s 10 times the work! Balancing her work in the diner, her cooking vlog, her chores AND her family is getting harder and harder. When she notices Patrick acting like playing with the kids occasionally is him doing his fair share, she decides she’s had enough! 👶🏻 👶🏽

Her girlfriends all have similar experiences - men who don’t help out in the house unless asked, men who only “babysit” their own kids…. and they’ve had enough! It’s time to ACT, and show them how much work it really is. Can the girls get their men dashing around the house, or will this end up being a recipe for disaster?

summary: Join Emily and Patrick in a hilarious battle of the sexes!
title: Delicious - Moms vs Dads

description: If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!  Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around. • Play to discover all these wintertime features: • Skin-tones and blushes • Eye-lenses and eyebrows • Fabulous mascaras • Tons of glamorous eyeshadows• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors• Wintry face-paints• Icy tops• Necklaces and earrings• Beautiful hairstyles  • Wonderful tiaras So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
descriptionHTML:
If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!

In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.

And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!
Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.

For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around.

• Play to discover all these wintertime features:
• Skin-tones and blushes
• Eye-lenses and eyebrows
• Fabulous mascaras
• Tons of glamorous eyeshadows
• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors
• Wintry face-paints
• Icy tops
• Necklaces and earrings
• Beautiful hairstyles
• Wonderful tiaras

So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
developerAddress: Romania
summary: If you love makeup and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
title: Ice Princess Makeup

description: Ever wondered what happens when you leave your puppy home alone? Does your puppy throw a secret disco party? Does she dress up in the most stylish outfits or ride her skateboard around the house?  Find out what really goes on when you’re not home!  Discover your puppy’s secret life - and get ready to party! descriptionHTML:

description: Never mess with your dream home & take well care about decoration through fresh flowers & plants while engaging mad or house helper with your family members.The Best Home Cleanup Game in 2018.House becomes a home when we spend our weekend in proper cleaning & washing. This cleaning app will teach you about the ways to clean the house and to be a perfectionist. Cleaning the house in your way the rooms, the hall, the kitchen, the bathrooms, and the whole house cleaning game. Cleaning the house Cleaning is usually done from top to bottom, i.e. dust from the top of the curtains to the underside, kitchen cabinets cleaning the top floor and bottom and so on, and from the right to the left, which must be cleaned.Make the bathroom look cleaner and shiny, and facilitate the process of cleaning the bathroom weekly and monthly.It's no secret that keeping your home clean and neat requires a great deal of time and energy, whether you live in a one-bedroom apartment or a four-bedroom house. These days, our schedules are so busy that it takes real dedication to set aside enough time for a thorough top-to-bottom cleaning.You don’t have to wait until spring to give your house a good cleaning! In-House Cleaning Day, clean up your house and get rid of the things which you don’t need. First, clean up all the rooms of your house from the kitchen to the bedroom and lastly your fish aquarium. descriptionHTML:
Never mess with your dream home & take well care about decoration through fresh flowers & plants while engaging mad or house helper with your family members.The Best Home Cleanup Game in 2018.House becomes a home when we spend our weekend in proper cleaning & washing.
This cleaning app will teach you about the ways to clean the house and to be a perfectionist.

Cleaning the house in your way the rooms, the hall, the kitchen, the bathrooms, and the whole house cleaning game. Cleaning the house Cleaning is usually done from top to bottom, i.e. dust from the top of the curtains to the underside, kitchen cabinets cleaning the top floor and bottom and so on, and from the right to the left, which must be cleaned.

Make the bathroom look cleaner and shiny, and facilitate the process of cleaning the bathroom weekly and monthly.

It's no secret that keeping your home clean and neat requires a great deal of time and energy, whether you live in a one-bedroom apartment or a four-bedroom house. These days, our schedules are so busy that it takes real dedication to set aside enough time for a thorough top-to-bottom cleaning.

You don’t have to wait until spring to give your house a good cleaning! In-House Cleaning Day, clean up your house and get rid of the things which you don’t need. First, clean up all the rooms of your house from the kitchen to the bedroom and lastly your fish aquarium. Wipe up dust, vacuum the floors, and throw away junk! Leave nothing dirty and fix anything that’s broken.
1. Fish Aquarium Cleanup
2. Kitchen Cleanup
3. Bed Room Cleanup
4. Bathroom Cleanup
5. Hall Cleanup

* Select the room for the cleanliness.
* The bedroom is so dirty, let's clean it.
* Let's clean the dirty dishes.
* The Bathroom sucks. Let's make it clean.
* OMG!! Everything is messed up in the hall. Let's clean it.
* So much dirt in the aquarium to clean.

description: Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.The game offers 5 modes :Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)Bonus mode.Game Features:- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.- Free game: play the game for free!- Choose your super heroe. - You can unlock four mine characters.- Incredibly easy operation.Go to adventure!
descriptionHTML:
Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.
Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)
Bonus mode.

Game Features:
- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.
- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.
- Free game: play the game for free!
- Choose your super heroe.
- You can unlock four mine characters.
- Incredibly easy operation.


Go to adventure!
summary: The main goal - to move forward no matter what. Survive at all costs.

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  🤗😠👍

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

Ultimate bowling 2014 This is by far one of the better bowling games I have ran across in very long time. You have more choices when it comes to the bowling balls, better control of the ball as you are sending it down the lane, I could go on but the one thing I would like to see change would be for you to show the pins like they do in real bowling that have gone down on your first shot like off to the side somewhere. This would make it even more realistic, otherwise I can't find a thing wrong so far with the game..hope you enjoy

Used to be better It nags you to death about installing Google Games, as if it won't run right without it (runs fine). Then if you install it it nags you to login. All this so that you can do stuff I have no interest in, like posting your scores online.  Allow us to turn off the nagging, please. This is the best bowling app I've seen, which is a sad statement about the quality of bowling apps. Unrealistic physics for the pin action that make it impossible to ever do a split. No way to impart a spin on the ball.

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.

comments: There are so few 500 apps out there you take what you can get, but the fact that Nullo cant be played until you unlock it as an achievement is garbage.  Its a standard hand, no reason this should be an unlockable feature.  If it was available from the start id give 5 stars.

A well designed game of a less common card game. I love that it is stand alone with small ads. I cannot stand have that need revenue from casino style in-game upgrades or "coins" so that you can keep playing. Either charge me a flat fee or make show me annoying but tolerably small ads on screen. This does the latter and that's fine with me. I think the developer actually likes to play 500 and it shows. Fun to play with some features that unlock as you play ads some interest. I grew up playing a house version so some rules are new to me which is fun to learn. Simple and complete game. I really like it.

I win the bid 85% and win 76% overall. I call nullo 15% of time and win 85% of that. If partner didn't  jerk me around then even better stats. I'd love to kick all your behinds. Yes, partner is a jerk but what partner isn't. Obviously the easier nullo call suits me but I am used to playing against better players that generally will not stop calling until a 8+ tricks is reached and that is when i need Mr nullo misere.  I enjoy it with all the glitches as people are just as glitched up. I would love friendlier stats and more of them. I play for the slam so give that stat pls.

Fantastic. The only other place I could play this would be in county. Good job. Gonna check out your other apps. Gonna toss ya a few bucks too. Online would be great. Stats and all that akin to Spades+. Now I'm just dreaming.
My favorite card game. By far the best one I've tried on my phone.  Ads are annoying but not enough to stop me from playing. Will tell my friends to use and teach others how to play with this app.

I hate the term nullo, should be misere.  Quite well coded, though partner tends to take the lead in No Trumps leaving me (who won the bid) defenseless. Would like to see a three handed version with a dumby hand (i.e. two players only). The porno ads really are insulting and irrelevant/annoying.

comments: Game is great had fun and provided an  emmersive experience. As a lover of the Café Racer culture it's nice to have a game that appeals to this specific group. My only complaint would be that I wished that there was more variety in terms of different modes. For example: Online where you can race and see other people's Café Racers  and race against each other or just a AI race mode. Overall a very entertaining free game and I highly recommend it to any motorcycle lovers.

As a motorcycle rider and enthusiast I can honestly say in my expert opinion that this game is the most realistic riding physics game I have played yet. The graphics are really cool and the possibilities seem endless when it comes to customizing the bikes. And I grew up with cafe racer style bikes and this game really hits the nail on the head. I want to make a suggestion to the people who made the game though. Mabey put in some racing levels or an online mode where you can race with fellow players of the game and see what other people have done with their bikes. It would make it more fun and interesting. Other than that, it's really awesome!

This game is really fun and addicting, I play it every time I get the chance since I don't enjoy many mobile games. This one is just a fun chill game where you ride around on a Cafe bike weaving in an out of traffic. I just wish there were more secrets or other things you could do in the game. Maybe like more hidden paths, customize  your character, more bikes, and more maps that aren't super expensive to unlock. Overall this game is really fun

Dear developer, this game is unique! I swear! I love this game very much, had a different story and gameplay from the other motorcycle game in playstore. But... Can you please update the game? I mean, the mirrors (real function, not flat color), look back option maybe, camera option when riding, photograph my bike wherever i park that thing. And if you guys thinking about to add revsbomb and manual gear, i really appreciate it, i should give you a 5 stars if you guys revise this game to be more fun. Once again, this game is awesome, i like it, thankyou for making a little time killer guys!!!

Best bike game, iiif!  The custom is not just caferacer and scrambler style,  rabbit or raised handlebars would be nice. Also, adjusting ride height would be cool. Gastank shape is sadly limited with the bikes default shape. And make the button position adjustable please... But overall a great game for bike enthusiasts,  free and no pushy adds

Please make the graphics more like real not like cartoon, add some ways in which we can turn and opt some different roads like in metros. Idea is great. I was really impressed with the usage of various day to day words like TV etc. And do make the oil station working. Add an oil meter so that we can fill oils at the oil stations. Also add some sporty bikes and also a working rear view mirrors
description: Endless moto racing in a unique low poly environment with a never before seen degree of customization. No timers, no fuel bars, no limits.Enjoy a realistically portrayed first person experience in a simplified world that lets you focus on what really matters - the multifaceted joys of motorcycling.Ride your motorcycle in one or two way roads, swerve and filter between realistically moving traffic, through cities, country roads and desert environments. All in glorious Low-Poly lack of detail.Pick from a variety of motorcycles, from small 125cc single cylinder bikes to powerfull in line fours, with boxer and in-line two cylinder motorcycles there for your chosing.Customize your motorcycle to your heart's content, changing anything from handlebars and mirrors to exhausts and wheels. And when you are done, paint them in the color combination of your liking - you can even paint the frame!Share your replays to show off your skills, take pictures of your unique customized bikes to show your creativity.Cafe Racer - a different breed of endless racingGAMEPLAY• Tilt, Slide,Touch and Gamepad control options• Use up arrow to accelerate and down arrow to brake• Press the middle edges of the screen to look aroundTIPS• The faster you ride, the faster your score will rise• When driving over 100 kmh, close overtakes will yield extra bonus points • Three difficulty levels - bigger danger, bigger rewards• If you can manage it, try to find alternative routes - bonus points await for high speed• If you hear a horn, try to move aside - a car is behind you, and it might just run you overFOLLOW CAFE RACER• https://www.facebook.com/caferacergame• https://twitter.com/CafeRacerGameCafe Racer will be updated regularly with more content and optimizations. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.
descriptionHTML:
Endless moto racing in a unique low poly environment with a never before seen degree of customization. No timers, no fuel bars, no limits.

Enjoy a realistically portrayed first person experience in a simplified world that lets you focus on what really matters - the multifaceted joys of motorcycling.

Ride your motorcycle in one or two way roads, swerve and filter between realistically moving traffic, through cities, country roads and desert environments. All in glorious Low-Poly lack of detail.

Pick from a variety of motorcycles, from small 125cc single cylinder bikes to powerfull in line fours, with boxer and in-line two cylinder motorcycles there for your chosing.

Customize your motorcycle to your heart's content, changing anything from handlebars and mirrors to exhausts and wheels. And when you are done, paint them in the color combination of your liking - you can even paint the frame!

Share your replays to show off your skills, take pictures of your unique customized bikes to show your creativity.

Cafe Racer - a different breed of endless racing


GAMEPLAY
• Tilt, Slide,Touch and Gamepad control options
• Use up arrow to accelerate and down arrow to brake
• Press the middle edges of the screen to look around

TIPS
• The faster you ride, the faster your score will rise
• When driving over 100 kmh, close overtakes will yield extra bonus points
• Three difficulty levels - bigger danger, bigger rewards
• If you can manage it, try to find alternative routes - bonus points await for high speed
• If you hear a horn, try to move aside - a car is behind you, and it might just run you over

FOLLOW CAFE RACER
• https://www.facebook.com/caferacergame
• https://twitter.com/CafeRacerGame


Cafe Racer will be updated regularly with more content and optimizations. Don't forget to leave a review with your feedback.

comments: You deserve 4-5 stars but you need to solve some issues first: 1: crashing into grass?...really? And I didn't even touched it.  2: I want the car to stay straight and the entire map to rotate according to my driving direction. Just like I would be in the car.  3: Make the area of the buttons larger to have a more accurate driving.  4: I would like, when I'm driving, the entire screen to zoom in a little to be able to drive through narrow spaces more quickly.  Give me the satisfaction of playing and I'll give you your 5 stars on all categories.
Annoying because the cars dont brake or stop so if there are two cars coming in opposing directions, there is no way to pass! Don't bother wasting your storage on this game!
It's just idiotic! And annoying! I can't explain why it just don't try it for yourself trust me you'll hate it I'm sure like every other reviewer.

The ads are incredibly annoying but only because they last far too long. They're not all that frequent so it's not so bad. I really enjoy the simplicity of the game, a lot of these parking games are 3d now and I don't much care for it. I'm ok with the controls but a little wheel might be better. It's pretty fair overall and the difficulty curve is pretty good for me as I have a short attention span. Amendment: after level 30, the game changes into trying to navigate heavy traffic in a car with no acceleration whatsoever. Not fun at all especially as the car you're driving is clearly a 458.
Everything was fine except for the controlls,not only were the petals terrible but also the steering wheel wuz not easy to control.For users of this app similar to me I would not recommend

description: Intercept, eliminate and extract. description: Climb! A Mountain in Your Pocket, a challenging game about climbing a mountain with an easy to learn, hard to master control.One button to grab with the left hand, another for the right; swing, jump, use your momentum and grab the diverse rocks to help you ascend through the mountain. But be careful, a single mistake could mean a fall down to the base camp.Reach to the main bases before your run out of stamina, find the best paths to go up, and overcome the different obstacles you will find in each level of the mountain.foot by foot, improve your record and climb higher each time mastering jumps and grabs.Compare and share your records with the rest of the players.Fight for the best time finishing the climb, if you achieve to reach the summit.

description: Are you crazy fans of fire and water or fire and ice (teamwork game) ?Fall in love adventure maze game and remember it from childhood ?Fire Red boy and his lover (ice girl - Water girl) who go with him is a puzzle adventure game for two players. It's an very addicting game to play with your kids, your lover and your friend.You've got two characters to control in this exciting puzzle game. comments: Much improved! Very impressed with the work done on the game. Some serious polish has gone under the hood. The current rating unfairly represents the current state of the game.  Everything has been given effort.  From combat to control,  the warp gate and power up detection.  Quests are still a bit buggy,  and some new music and vehicles wouldn't hurt things at all. Game has ZERO pop-up Ads.  All ads are voluntary  and easily can play without ever seeing one.

Just fun to play I have to admit that this game surprised me. I was expecting low gameplay, repetitive and quickly thrown together...but not the case here. This game has amazing visuals, it's fast paced, re-playability is high, and the soundtrack is great. I would love to see more than one life per run. I dont mind watching an ad, but they often dont load which resets the game and any work done for that run. I had hoped that the Facebook issue had been resolved with this last update...but it was not...still cant login.

This is a great game and the concept is amazing. Although I do wish there a lower detail mode for it as my tablet isn't able to run it well and I get input delay. (I am using battery saver mode if that does anything but I would prefer a low detail mode for lower end devices)

Apart from other bugs there's another thing that when you use the warp the banner, that comes on the screen displaying what sector it is, is intrusive and keeps the screen occupied for a very long time. This hinders the visibility and eventually the ship crashes many a times. So, either the banner needs to be more transparent or its visibility time needs to be reduced.

Many obstacles are impossible to dodge if they were in front of you even if you were still far away, cause you don't have enough time to turn. Also some obstacles move towards you right when you're next to them which is also impossible to dodge. Otherwise the game is fun but I won't play it anymore.
Would be a lot better if I can pay to get rid of the ads. I just threw$5 at the game and nothing changes nor do you gain anything. I'm all up for supporting games, but really over the ad aspect

comments: This game is actually really fun, but two stars for the ads. They're not well-distributed, having reached a point where no ads would show up after a few runs, and then one would appear after every run no matter how short. A 30 second ad after a run that ended in just a couple seconds? Multiple times in a row? I understand ads needs to be there, but I'd like to have more play time than ad time.

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars

The game itself is pretty fun. I think I'd like it. But the ads are far, far too intrusive. Not only are there too many. But, many of them have timers. Some are 30 seconds, and you can't break out. Too annoying. I have no interest I sitting and waiting for ads to finish

Too redundant. After a couple times it's boring and way too many Ads. I only played 5 rounds and there were Ads after every round. That's 5 Ads for every minute of gameplay (give or take). Developers are making a killing. Little too greedy if you ask me and all of you are falling for it.📵

Its shameful how some developers ruin their games with such amount of ads! A new ad every new page!! WOW! For that kind of games, the ones you die quickly - it's not recommended to have a new video ad on every page! It makes you get board of the game and you end up watching more ads than playing the actual game.. 2 stars for the concept and beautifully ruined game.

Waaay too many ads, especially in the beginning when you're still getting the hang of the gameplay. Having to watch a 15 second ad after every crash – given how often that happens – is unnecessary. Granting 3 lives between ads would do a lot to keep players who would otherwise say "I don't have time for this" and drop the app like I did.  I would even be willing to pay to get rid of ads once I know that I like the gameplay, but the current system interrupts play so much that I couldn't even get to that point.

Add vibrant colours to improve viewing experience. This is all my suggestions .. think of it .  Thank You & God Bless You...!!!😍

With a 4 foot (1.225 meter) vertical jump height and a top speed of over 44 mph (72 kmph) this little guy is speedy quick. But so is the freaking giant wave that's behind him.  It's a great game, if a little monotonous and unchanging. It was compelling enough to make me spend the time to figure out how fast that little guy was running though. I like it!

Excellent one-note time waster... Slightly monotonous, yes. Graphically minimalistic but a tad too much... Still, excellent and responsive controls and a competent, interesting concept for a small free game... Challenge is to top your own prior scores...this game is on the right track... Just needs more... But controls simple and with near perfect responsiveness...

This is a perfect example of an arcade style game done right, great time killer and it's pretty  simple to pick up on and pretty easy to get good at. The style is on point and so I would recommend this to anyone, especially those, who are on a regular basis, stuck in situations where they're forced to wait around for whatever reason in reality. Great job!

Interesting game but, could you please make the obstacles less darker? Especially that annoying spike which I barely notice because it just looks like a normal grass! & Also The wings progressive bar should be placed at the top right corner, that would be easier to see.

Hey could you guys change the sound effect when the dude falls to the water? It really bothers me. Like, that sound effect is of something relatively small falling down on calm water, because you can hear drops after the main sound is heard. It's a tsunami, you shouldn't hear the drops of water you would hear when dropping a purse into a pool. If you changed it that would be a real change for me... Thanks!

description: Explore the terror of an unlawful city where survival is the only option among the deadly enemies.This game lets you enter a match of survival death where you can experience an explosive third person shooter. You need to face powerful and lethal enemy prisoners that have escape from jail.You have to stop them from destroying the city!The different missions of the game are highly entertaining and several exciting features enhance the excitement. There are various weapons to pick up including grenades, you can enter the different vehicles to escape or defend yourself, get a jetpack and even destroy the buildings around the city! Enjoy a fast-paced shooter action and defeat enemy gangs that will come for you.New Features:Full update to Third person gameplayFlying jetpackTanks, taxis, planes, a lot of vehicles and new weaponsMultiple missionsStore with new elementsAchievements and power-upsMini-bosses Destructible environment, destructible everything!explosions!more explosions! even more explosions!
descriptionHTML:
Explore the terror of an unlawful city where survival is the only option among the deadly enemies.

This game lets you enter a match of survival death where you can experience an explosive third person shooter. You need to face powerful and lethal enemy prisoners that have escape from jail.
You have to stop them from destroying the city!

The different missions of the game are highly entertaining and several exciting features enhance the excitement. There are various weapons to pick up including grenades, you can enter the different vehicles to escape or defend yourself, get a jetpack and even destroy the buildings around the city! Enjoy a fast-paced shooter action and defeat enemy gangs that will come for you.

New Features:
Full update to Third person gameplay
Flying jetpack
Tanks, taxis, planes, a lot of vehicles and new weapons
Multiple missions
Store with new elements

Destructible environment, destructible everything!

description: Outsiders are invading the homeland. They are the incarnation of evil. Our homeland and territory need your protection. Are you ready?****CREATE YOUR DREAM SQUAD****Create your own team by choosing your favorite heroes! Armed them with the most advanced gears and match them the best partners to unlock super powerful skills. Go to Arena to find your opponents. Conquer them and enjoy the joy to be King of Arena.  ****COLLECT SHINNING GEARS SET****Each hero has its corresponding fated set of gears. Collecting a complete set of gear for the hero you love can brings bonus to hero's characteristics of ATK, HP, Rebound,Leech,Tenacity,Dodge,Hit and Crit. Adopt advanced tactics and blow your enemies heads.****BECOME TOP 1 IN UNIVERSE****Team up an invincible squad and then challenge other players in Tournament, Cross-server Arena, and League war to become a Fighter of Universe in Hall of Fame.****BECOME THE STRONGEST WARRIOR/COMMANDER IN LEAGUE****As a warrior having a great dream. How could you not build a League of your own? Just build one. Call all the friends around you to join in the League. You will be the Commander with absolute power on your League management. Seize every opportunity to fight with other Leagues. Earn bonus and frame!GO FOR FREE NOW!Please visit facebook.com/SpaceWarriors.cw or @SpaceWarriors.cw to follow us for the latest news and support. We are here waiting for you!

Outsiders are invading the homeland. They are the incarnation of evil. Our homeland and territory need your protection. Are you ready?

****CREATE YOUR DREAM SQUAD****
Create your own team by choosing your favorite heroes! Armed them with the most advanced gears and match them the best partners to unlock super powerful skills. Go to Arena to find your opponents. Conquer them and enjoy the joy to be King of Arena.

Each hero has its corresponding fated set of gears. Collecting a complete set of gear for the hero you love can brings bonus to hero's characteristics of ATK, HP, Rebound,Leech,Tenacity,Dodge,Hit and Crit. Adopt advanced tactics and blow your enemies heads.

Team up an invincible squad and then challenge other players in Tournament, Cross-server Arena, and League war to become a Fighter of Universe in Hall of Fame.

As a warrior having a great dream. How could you not build a League of your own? Just build one. Call all the friends around you to join in the League. GO FOR FREE NOW!
Please visit facebook.com/SpaceWarriors.cw or @SpaceWarriors.cw to follow us for the latest news and support. We are here waiting for you!

comments: Nice game with very good events but the drop rates to heroes of 5 star is too low i killed a lot of gems and scrols and hero orbs and my first 5 star i  dropped it at lvl 75. Okok now again event of summoning 100 scrolls and i continue still no 5 star hero only 4, just try and fix the drop rate. In the rest its a nice game.

I purchased the spring festival card on top of all the money I've already dumped into this game and the devs didn't give me my in game rewards. I've submitted numerous tickets to get a refund or my rewards and they just reply there is no problem. Ya no problem with you taking my money.  They deleted my review, wonder how many other people had this issue and had reviews deleted.

Wasn't sure about this game at first. I love it. I use a f2p  and a vip one  to see  the difference  between the two. Really well done. Having said all that the game does require patience. This is an IDLE game. You pick it up do dailies, talk, spend money, or what ever you want to do in game, then put it down to "farm gold,xp,mats". The high end heros do take some planning to aquire as a f2p player. This game requires patience because it's an IDLE game. Yes some people have a ton of money to throw at the game but don't be jealous, just play your game and have fun.

Honestly gameplay and all is good but the game is so p2w it's not funny, it would cost u over a hundred dollars just to complete every reward for new Valentine's event. If you like this game play private server instead this version is a giant cash grab. Not competitive for f2p at all

There is certainly alot to do, but is there really much to DO do? I've just been continually tapping red dots and getting free prizes, which (although nice) doesn't feel like I'm especially earning anything, you know?  Feels like a game that will keep you occupied for maybe months, but a year after you delete it will you really REMEMBER it? Probably not.

Not what I expected, given that my first impression of it was of IH being an "annoying add". Once I decided to pick it up though my thoughts changed rather drastically.   It's simple, it's fun and the warm colour palette of the graphics make a nice change compared to the widespread use of bleak colours in other games.   If you think you might enjoy this game, you sure are my friend.

descriptionHTML:
"Android Excellence Game" of Google Play. Play with 12 million global players!
Join millions of other players around the world and start your journey from Sara Forest to the High Heaven, leading your band of heroes into ancient ruins to battle the forces of darkness!

GAME FEATURES:

★IDLE System★
Set your heroes training while you’re away. When you return to your phone, they will be stronger, gained new abilities, and ready for battle. Grow & Train a powerful squad without all the grinding!

★Evolving Strategy★
More than 200 Heroes in different factions with specific skills. Summon your Warriors, TRAIN them to become powerful heroes, or convert them into Spirit material for EVOLVING. Forge magical gears, and outfit your warriors for victory!

★TONS of Content★
With battlegrounds galore and dungeons aplenty, heroic quests, mysterious towers, arena, guild, much fun to enjoy!

★GUILD Wars★
Fight alongside your friends and players everywhere in a war for control of the floating continent. Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy!

★Worldwide Arena★
Put forth your best heroes to do battle in the ARENA. Watch them PK online in a multiplayer contest for glory! Climb the Leader board for the best rewards!

description: Everyone in this world love his or her school days, always remembering your school days give a smile on your face even in your bad time. Welcome to the virtual school of the vice city in this Gangster Girl in High School simulator, this will remember your teen school days. Where you have to play as a gangster Girl to do all these things with your teachers, principle, bullyboys and with the classmates that you miss out in your school days.Enjoy the most incredible Gangster Girl in High School simulator with incredible missions to play with. Choose your bully school girl to play with, tease everyone in school in the absence of the principal and show that how funny as well as your bully days was. 3D school environment, beautiful classrooms, and tons of students busy in their classwork give you the realistic feeling of your school days. Smooth controls and incredible missions in Gangster Girl in High School simulator made this game addictive.  GAMEPLAY:Get ready to play with the most amazing Gangster Girl in High School simulation with interesting missions. You have to choose your beautiful bully gangster girl to play such amazing missions in virtual school of vice city. Where you have to steal your mark sheet from the principal office and try to escape from the principal of the virtual school.Stand against other bully gangster boys, also steal football from them and do not get caught by him. Pick up the duster from the other classroom while teacher is busy in his lecture, do not caught by the teacher otherwise you have to face punishment from the teacher. Tease the other classmates by your funny movement. Fight with the gangster boys of the school that are disturbing your friend. Many more missions are also waiting in Gangster Girl in High School simulation. 3D graphics and fun gameplay made this game to the best school games. Gangster Girl in High School simulator specially designed for the school games crazier fans and lovers.Gangster Girl in High School Features:•	Choose your wonderful bully girl to play with.•	Irritate your classmates, principal, and teacher.•	Fight with the gangster boys•	Realistic school simulation with smooth controls.•	Steal mark sheet from the principal room.•	3D graphics and amazing camera angles.Gangster Girl in High School simulation contains thrilling and incredible missions, any user love to play such school games. Just grab your favorite virtual school girl to play with and make trouble to everyone with your bad skills. Just make a wonderful entry in the gaming world of Gangster Girl in High School simulation and show how crazy you are in your school days.

comments: It's great! But... could you please put a replace Facebook with Gmail instead? Facebook recently has been tight with their security and i can't be sure if my account would last long even though i invested too much in this game... so please, developers. Here me out on this. Not just me, but the whole community that supports your game. Make Honkai great again then ever before seen. Thank you.

Honkai Impact 3 is one of the best  hack and slash action RPG in mobile games. Not only the gameplay is beautiful, but the controls are very tight. Love the graphics as they are very detailed and fluid in movement. I also appreciate how the game lets you adjust in-game's graphic so everyone can play according to their smartphone's specs. This game deserves more attention.  P.S : it would be wonderful if dev can make the game link to our gmail account instead, because it's not always safe using facebook. This will help many player feels safe about their investment.

I love this game so much , especially on Yae sakura valkyrie♥. And very nice animation. If you can, pls reduces a price Diamond. is really expensive for me. Plus, can you make it some stage we can farm a Diamond in future?? is really hard to get some diamond more. and pls make a variety item shop for Gold instead using Diamond, i felt useless with many gold in this game.  I hope this game is more interesting and can buy more valkyrie's fragment by using gold in game in future. I know is Pay to win in this game, but please think for it for better in future because this game has potential to going up..   Good luck Devs Honkai Impact 3 I love this much game and thank you so much for Yae Sakura character ♥

Been seeing this game on the playstore but never bothered to install it. I was wrong. It was so much fun to play with and the levels are well thought since you can actually achieve 3 stars even though you just started to play the game plus the game is generous enough to give characters and gems to spend on the game. It doesn't force you to spend real money. It gives you the decision to to that which is a plus factor. Will definitely play this game for a long time. Can you please add auto complete feature on stages that has 3 stars already. Thanks!

This game is amazing... The graphics are smooth, the gameplay is amazing, and for a mobile game my phone can handle 60 fps from it, you guys made something i never expected in mobile. A few minor things though, 1. The first thing is that this game is a bit grindy because of the level you need to unlock new levels, but that encourages doing hard/supreme mode so yeah, i love that you put dark souls and bloodborne references in the achievments, well the game is doing well so far so keep it that way, (also pls add offline mode, just a suggestion)

I don't even know anymore. This is, without a doubt, one of the most robust, refined, and beautiful pieces of software on the Android market today. The combat is punchy and visceral, the controls are tight, the character designs are neat and stylish without going overboard, and the story is very anime if you catch my drift. Progression is nice and smooth even without spending a single dime, especially with all the gifts and events the devs put out. If you consider yourself even slightly interested in ARPGS like Devil May Cry, you absolutely owe it to yourself to try this one out.
description: New Update - World's Cutest Valkyrie, Theresa Attack![Game Descriptions]"Honkai, the mysterious power responsible for destroying human civilization countless times, has descended upon this beautiful world once again…” With the lands now flooded with deadwalkers and Honkai beasts, a group of girls bearing the burdens of despair continue their fight onward. Will there be any hope of clinging to survival?"Honkai Impact 3 follows the story of Kiana and her team's resistance against the Honkai. In an epic adventure of saving the world, the experiences of the Valkyries—Kiana, Mei, and Bronya gradually unfold. Players will play as Captain of the warship Hyperion, commanding each of the unique Valkries in their fight against deadwalkers and Honkai beast around the globe. Players will progress through various stages, experience different storylines, and fight together for all that is beautiful in the world![New Features]---- [Cute & Righteous]"Teriteri So Easy~"The world's cutest Valkyries, the principal Theresa, attacks! descriptionHTML:
New Update - World's Cutest Valkyrie, Theresa Attack!


[Game Descriptions]
"Honkai, the mysterious power responsible for destroying human civilization countless times, has descended upon this beautiful world once again…”
With the lands now flooded with deadwalkers and Honkai beasts, a group of girls bearing the burdens of despair continue their fight onward. Will there be any hope of clinging to survival?"
Honkai Impact 3 follows the story of Kiana and her team's resistance against the Honkai. In an epic adventure of saving the world, the experiences of the Valkyries—Kiana, Mei, and Bronya gradually unfold. Players will play as Captain of the warship Hyperion, commanding each of the unique Valkries in their fight against deadwalkers and Honkai beast around the globe. Players will progress through various stages, experience different storylines, and fight together for all that is beautiful in the world!

[New Features]
---- [Cute & Righteous]
"Teriteri So Easy~"
The world's cutest Valkyries, the principal Theresa, attacks! S-rank [Violet Executer], A-rank [Valkyrie Pledge] are now available to aid Captains in battle!
Captain, what are you waiting for? Be a good boy and come back to the Battleship so principal Theresa can teach you a good lesson!

---- [Theresa's Everlasting Memory]
A pure soul born in a laboratory, an artificial life bearing memory of despair.
With a body that can't grow older, and a will to protect her beloved ones that never changed through time.
"The Oath of Judah, this time I must protect the ones I love!"

----[New Equipment]
"I will protect you with my life!"
The Lunar New Year Festival is approaching, and Theresa's new Stigmata is also joining the Captains on their journey to fight the [Honkai] war!
Also, the new Cross weapon series is now available ---- Oath of Judah will also be making its way into Battleship Hyperion's armory, to help the Captains fight the Honkai!

[SUPPORT]
If you encounter any problem while playing Honkai Impact 3, please contact the support center in-game and send us your feedback!

title: Honkai Impact 3

comments: I have only had the game a few hours and I am already falling in love with it. It is great to go on when you have a spare 10-15 minutes. The grid is larger than others so I can read the words fluently and quickly without them being hard to see. You get points after each time you complete the grid so if you are really stuck you can receive a hint for some points. I would highly recommend this excellent game.

Only been playing for a few days now, and so far, I love it! Forgot how fun Word Search puzzles can be, and to have it on my phone is priceless lol.. No complaints with the app so far. I will say though, maybe they should tweak it just a tad, instead of giving a hint only after a short moment, possibly creating 'the option' to have a hint may be a little better. Not a big deal to me. It truly is a great app, love the simplicity of the graphic design too. Glad I came across this game.

I enjoy ALMOST the whole game, being a word find and all, simple, yet deceptively hard at times. Still, I wish there was a way to turn off the 'hints' it gives, as they get annoying... unless there IS a way that I haven't discovered yet...otherwise, I REALLY like the game, and would suggest it to all ages, as it's not too tough for the young ones, but still challenging enough for experienced players.

Pretty good word search game. It's sometimes hard to hit the right letters, especially toward the bottom of the screen. Occasionally words share more than one letter in common. Sometimes  (especially in the  lower levels) a word will show up more than  once in a puzzle. Maybe extra credit for finding a word that's not on the list?

It's a good game but there needs to be a way to turn off hints. If you don't find a word in the time it thinks you should, it keeps giving hints which ruins the gameplay. I pause for various reasons like talking to someone, cat catching a mouse, watching tv at the time, etc.. Or sometimes it might take longer to fins a word than seconds allowed before the hint.

I love this game. Really nice and well thought out game. It's educative too. But I have just one issue with it though: The flashing hint. This gets me distracted each time it flashes. Maybe there could be a hint button at the bottom of the puzzle. That way instead of it flashing and getting us distracted, we could just click on it whenever we need help. Apart from that, it's just perfect. Will give it a 5 when the flashing hint is worked on😁

comments: Never have i ever put so much input on caring for anything and anybody apart from myself. Explains why I so single. Anyway, this game has taught me the value if life and not to put them in a planet full of corrosive atmosphere and with no resources. It will not end well. I am trying yo beat my high score of 11000 and when i do, i may be the next SpaceX project manager. Keep up with the good work and waiting for more updates. Also always pass through the interplanetary disk. They will upgrade one of your sensors.

This is what the appstore needs. More games like this. I mean not any more "gun shoot bang zombie war" but games that make you think. That creates genuine emotion. The only games that have done that is this ga- piece of art, and instlife. Keep up the great work. Ps please Add stuff like star rings and Dyson spheres

Great creative text based game. Follows the same simple sequence of events that might become repetitive, but the creative world building is enough to keep you interested in trying out variations to see the type of planet and society you can build. Recommend for some non addictive down time

Simple easy to use text. Hard to put down. Maybe new worlds will come in the next up date. Along with some more choices to deal with like a paasanger awakens early do to space madness or is awaken from outside disturbance,Sickness ect..*****

Love it.  Only thing I hated was not being able to continue after colonizing the planet.  Please add a huge story line after the planet has been colonized.  I'd totally pay 5$ or more for that depending on the quality of the story line.

It's actually quite amazing. Very interesting, your choices matter, and the variety of events and endings is spectacular. First time, I managed to make a post-scarcity information age utopia, and it's gone down hill since then. Still great fun, though.
description: An AI ship full of frozen colonists must find the best planet to be the new home of the human race. A randomly-generated text-based strategy game.Push your luck: do you settle here, on this not-quite-ideal planet, or keep searching and risk your ship being damaged in the journey? The planets you encounter are randomly generated, and as you travel you encounter random events, so each playthrough is different. See the stories of the colonies you found, and keep trying for a higher score.
descriptionHTML:
An AI ship full of frozen colonists must find the best planet to be the new home of the human race. A randomly-generated text-based strategy game.

Push your luck: do you settle here, on this not-quite-ideal planet, or keep searching and risk your ship being damaged in the journey? The planets you encounter are randomly generated, and as you travel you encounter random events, so each playthrough is different. See the stories of the colonies you found, and keep trying for a higher score.
summary: The Earth is gone. Find a new home for the last survivors of the human race.
title: Seedship

description: Have you ever dream to be a er emergency surgeon and help sick patients to heal? If your answer is YES! than Crazy little doctors from Happy Baby Games is here to make your dream come true with ER Emergency Multi Surgery Hospital : Doctor Game. You have been appointed as crazy surgeon in ER Emergency Multi Surgery Hospital & now it’s your duty to treat your patients with multi diseases surgeries. Be the crazy surgeon to perform crazy operations with real life saving doctor instruments & injection. The ER Emergency Multi Surgery Hospital room is well equipped with all the medical doctor instruments to perform er emergency surgery by crazy surgeon in hospital. The ER Emergency Multi Surgery Hospital is doctor simulation game where you experience being a surgeon, the patients keep coming & you’re the only one who can save patients life. Become the real lifesaving doctor and crazy er emergency surgeon to perform the doctor simulation on your patients. Test your skills, become a professional er emergency surgeon, treat patients with painful expressions and make patients smile again with their love ones. But first you need to know patient's history before treating and sending patients to the operation room. Hurry Its ER Emergency!Some one has call for virtual ambulance, thank god virtual ambulance has reached in time otherwise the patient would have gone in a frozen state. The virtual Ambulance doctor has noted down the symptoms on his way to multi surgery hospital. Here comes a new patient to get treated from surgery doctor in ER Emergency Multi Surgery Hospital. Open the doors of multi surgery hospital & take patients to the operation room of Multi Surgery Hospital.Stomach Surgery SimulatorThe ambulance has brought a little boy with a stomachache, seems like it is a case of food poisoning for which you are going to operate him in operation room. Get ready for stomach surgery, you need to make an incision on his tummy to pull out junk food from his stomach.Eye Surgery SimulatorOne of the kid has came with his mommy to get his  eye sight checkup from specialist eye surgery doctor. Use special surgery simulator doctor medical instruments to stretch open eyes, remove germs and kill unwanted bacteria from kids eyes with laser treatment! Knee Surgery SimulatorOne of the patients is moaning in pain as he got knee injury that can affect his ankle, leg & foot movement. To avoid any other damage, prepare for the knee surgery simulator. Throat Surgery SimulatorOne of the patient is suffering with throat infection & you need to treat them well to regain his health. With a throat problem patient might get a problem with their ears & eyes too since they are interlinked. Consult an ENT (Ear, Nose, Throat) surgeon to perform a throat surgery simulation. Ribcage Surgery SimulatorUnfortunately one of the patients met with a bad accident & his ribcage got broken. The broken ribcage need ER emergency attention of the crazy surgeon otherwise it may damage respiratory system i.e lungs or heart. Don’t forget to clean away the blood to avoid infection. Brain Surgery SimulatorOne of the patient has been diagnose with brain tumour in his head that can affect his arm, finger and leg movement or ultimately paralysis may effect his body. Brain controls our heart, eye, ear, nose, kidney, liver, lungs, stomach and all parts of the body. You are going to be virtual brain doctor surgeon to perform this important operation. Call the Heart doctor, kidney doctor, lung doctor, anesthetist and all other surgeons on duty to keep a check on the patient’s organs while you carry out the surgery simulation.Features:* Realistic Fun surgeries, operations and treatments!* Amazing graphics and crazy game play.• Perform complex medical treatments.• Become the best surgeon in hospital.• Enjoy the doctor clinic games with a wide variety of tools.• Crazy nurses and doctors team to assist you in your surgery clinic.

Play police city chase adventure drift to beat NY super police stunt driving and don't police chase wanted robber. Catch the smart Terrorist and make him fall in your trap. Airborne city perfect asphalt parking and police drag criminal car simulator and other Terrorist police asphalt car chase driving. Don’t let the extremists take the highway track because this way the user may unleash turbo fast car and it will be hardest job to catch that terrorist. The terrorists have confiscated the town and hide their self in somewhere go and caught them. Fun game and not overloaded with ads like some games.(don't have Facebook, maybe add Google+ in the future?)2-26-18: on level 45 game moves very slowly to almost freezing up. Please fix. It's a nice game.
UNINSTALLING. Originally gave 5 stars, but at higher levels, it will crash and take you backwards, then just close completely. Needs work!!
Make two or three moves, this app takes care of the rest.  Who wants to go through that?  Uninstalling.

descriptionHTML:
Candy Charming is a fantastic match puzzle game full of love and joy! Explore magical candy kingdoms, helping lovely candy fairy to blast the new delicious adventure!

Jump into the magical candy wonderland, free to matching and crushing hundreds of match-3 levels! Tasty match quests are waiting for your challenge, innovative candy spells are waiting to be collected! Start now playing Candy Charming!

Features:
- Super delicious and addictive gameplay
- Hundreds of challenging and unique match-3 levels
- Hit the hidden sweet floating island and timed tasks
- Different wonderful game-worlds with new designs
- Sweet and powerful boosters helping you solve the quests
- Tasty candies with interesting and special power-ups
- Leaderboard to watch your friends and competitor globally
- No Wi-Fi or internet connection required to play
- Hundreds of best levels to be added regularly for your entertainment
- Sync your game data between devices when connected to internet

Candy Charming is completely free to play but some of the in-game items require payment.

comments: Poorly optimized for an unoriginal idea. Side shots are difficult to control, fast forward is automatic, gameplay is uninspired, arcade more looses your spot if you exit out of the app, and many more issues.   Don't waste your time downloading this app.
Love it, classic nostalgic game for a new generation
Best game i ever  played
description: Bricks breaker king is combined brick break and bubble shooter's gameplay.Break all bricks with a given ball. Break the bricks much and more at once, you can get higher score. Challenge hundreds of levels. You can do that. [How to play]- shoot the ball with the aim- the bricks break when the number of bricks is 0- the game is over when the bricks touch the floor [Feature]- easy and simple to play- level mode supported - arcade mode supported- 100 balls(one shot)mode supported- multi-play supported- tablet supported- achievements and leaderboard supported
descriptionHTML:
Bricks breaker king is combined brick break and bubble shooter's gameplay.
Break all bricks with a given ball. Break the bricks much and more at once, you can get higher score. Challenge hundreds of levels. You can do that.

[How to play]
- shoot the ball with the aim
- the bricks break when the number of bricks is 0
- the game is over when the bricks touch the floor

[Feature]
- easy and simple to play
- level mode supported
- arcade mode supported
- 100 balls(one shot)mode supported
- multi-play supported
- tablet supported
- achievements and leaderboard supported
developerAddress: 56, Eoulmadang-ro, Mapo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea
summary: Shoot the ball and break the block
